transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji madam India Mart se baat kar rahe hain free hue hain aap?
Customer: Bolo madam.
Executive: Aap online aa sakte hain aapne bola tha na online aa jayenge to aa sakte hain kya?
Customer: Haan wait main aa rahi.
Executive: Madam lekin main 4:30 baje bola tha aapko call karungi.
Executive: 4:30 baje aapne bola tha na 4:30 baje ek bar maine call kiya tha I don't know aapka phone ja nahi raha tha ring.
Customer: Kya aapka madam.
Executive: Haan maine kiya tha aapko.
Customer: Kya ho gaya nahi join kar sakti hain kya?
Executive: Beta main aapko call kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Aap mujhe message kar do main aapko message kar dungi abhi main kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Sorry main 5 minute mein join kar rahi hoon.
Customer: 5 minute mein kar rahi hain okay okay jab join karna hai to bata dena aap theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was expected to be online.

- Executive mentioned calling at 4:30 but couldn't reach the customer.

- Customer asked if she cannot join.



Resolution:

- Executive will message the customer and join in 5 minutes.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will message the customer and join in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to Agreeable



@@@Key Topics:

indiamart, online, call, join
